SELECT MENU_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , FORDER_YN , LVL , DEPTH , MENU_PATH , PARENT_NO , PATH , USE_YN , CHILDREN FROM( WITH RECURSIVE HIERARCHY_MENU AS ( SELECT MENU_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , FORDER_YN , CONCAT(MENU_NO) AS path , CONCAT(TITLE) AS MENU_PATH , 0 AS LVL , DEPTH , PARENT_NO , USE_YN FROM MENU WHERE PARENT_NO=0 AND ID=#{id}
UNION ALL SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.TITLE , M.DESCRIPT , M.FORDER_YN , CONCAT(HM.PATH ,M.MENU_NO) AS PATH , CONCAT(HM.MENU_PATH ,">",M.TITLE) AS MENU_PATH , HM.LVL+1 AS LVL , M.DEPTH , M.PARENT_NO , M.USE_YN FROM HIERARCHY_MENU HM JOIN MENU M ON HM.MENU_NO = M.PARENT_NO AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT MENU_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , FORDER_YN , LVL , DEPTH , PATH , MENU_PATH , PARENT_NO , USE_YN , (SELECT 'CHILDREN_EXIST' FROM HIERARCHY_MENU group by PARENT_NO HAVING PARENT_NO= MENU_NO ) AS CHILDREN FROM HIERARCHY_MENU ORDER BY PATH ) MENU_PATH WHERE USE_YN ='Y';

WITH RECURSIVE HIERARCHY_WORD AS ( SELECT WORD_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , FORDER_YN , CONCAT(WORD_NO) AS PATH , CONCAT(TITLE) AS MENU_PATH , 0 AS LVL , DEPTH , PARENT_NO FROM WORD WHERE PARENT_NO=0 AND ID=#{id}
UNION ALL SELECT W.WORD_NO , W.TITLE , W.DESCRIPT , W.FORDER_YN , CONCAT(HW.PATH ,W.WORD_NO) AS PATH , CONCAT(HW.MENU_PATH ,">",W.TITLE) AS MENU_PATH , HW.LVL+1 AS LVL , W.DEPTH , W.PARENT_NO FROM HIERARCHY_WORD HW JOIN WORD W ON HW.WORD_NO = W.PARENT_NO ) SELECT WORD_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , FORDER_YN , PATH , MENU_PATH , LVL , DEPTH , PARENT_NO , (SELECT 'CHILDREN_EXIST' FROM HIERARCHY_WORD group by PARENT_NO HAVING PARENT_NO= WORD_NO ) AS CHILDREN FROM HIERARCHY_WORD ORDER BY PATH

SELECT MENU_NO , ID , TITLE , DESCRIPT , DEPTH , SORT , PARENT_NO , FORDER_YN , USE_YN , INS_DATE , UPT_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MENU WHERE PARENT_NO = M.MENU_NO ) AS UNDER_COUNT FROM MENU M WHERE PARENT_NO = #{menuNo} AND ID = #{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT WORD_NO , ID , TITLE , DESCRIPT , DEPTH , SORT , PARENT_NO , FORDER_YN , USE_YN , INS_DATE , UPT_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM WORD WHERE PARENT_NO = W.WORD_NO ) AS UNDER_COUNT FROM WORD W WHERE PARENT_NO = #{menuNo} AND ID = #{id} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
